system.description: Sea serpents are the wyrms of the sea.
system.appearance: Like a smaller, longish dragon without wings.
system.hpIncrease: Gain another hit die for every 1 additional size.

overview.base: You gain Battle Roar Aura and Improved Battle Cry.
This ability cannot affect deaf creatures.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You gain Battle Cry Aura and Battle Cry Resistance.
This ability cannot affect deaf creatures.

results.fail: Targets become frightened.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' turns, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.

overview.base: You resist being frightened.

system.endCondition: You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base: Your natural armor is dragon scale.

results.hit: Target is dead, ruined, and their SIZE is reduced by 2. If their SIZE was already 2 or less, their body is completely consumed.

overview.base: At the start of each of your turns, you heal and regain that many HP. This does not consume your hit die. If you take fire damage, this effect doesn't apply on your next turn.
At the start of each of your turns, you revitalize and regain that many MP. This does not consume your mana die.
You gain Offensive Martial Arts and Defensive Martial Arts.

Your hands count as weapons for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base:
Your hands count as shields for the purposes of abilities that target them (although they cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may block with them and their BV is +1.
Note: This does not make your hands blocking.
You gain Supernatural Strength. In addition, you deal boosted with all melee weapon attacks and they are AV0 for you.
You gain Giant Strength and Shattering Grip. In addition, you may deboost any melee weapon attack to make it AV0.
You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.

overview.base: Target is shattered.
You always have at least 4 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
You gain Bite and become fluent in it. Additionally, your mouth is AV0.

Your mouth counts as a weapon for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be shattered or destroyed). You may attack with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
overview.proficient: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d6]].
overview.fluent: The damage die is instead [[/damage 1d8]].

overview.base: You can stay under water indefinitely without drowning.
You have Swimming and Diving but have no walk speed.
You swim at full speed.
You no longer have to stay on the surface of water while Swimming.
